scripts.build: yarn workspace @paparats/shared build && yarn workspace @paparats/server build && yarn workspace @paparats/cli build
scripts.build:docker:multi: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f packages/server/Dockerfile -t paparats-server:latest .
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker build -t ibaz/paparats-server:latest -f packages/server/Dockerfile . && docker compose -f $HOME/.paparats/docker-compose.yml up -d --force-recreate paparats
scripts.test: yarn workspace @paparats/shared build && yarn workspace @paparats/shared test && yarn workspace @paparats/server test && yarn workspace @paparats/cli test
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace @paparats/shared build && yarn workspace @paparats/shared typecheck && yarn workspace @paparats/server typecheck && yarn workspace @paparats/cli typecheck
scripts.check: yarn typecheck && yarn lint && yarn prettier:check
scripts.publish:cli: yarn build && yarn workspace @paparats/cli exec npm publish
